custom-sql.sql: select c.master_code, c.display_text_en as code_display_text_en, c.display_text_chi as code_display_text_chi, c.active as code_active, c.subcode_enabled, c.remarks as code_remarks, cd.id as code_detail_id, cd.detail_code, cd.seq, cd.display_text_en as code_detail_display_text_en, cd.display_text_chi as code_detail_display_text_chi, cd.symbol, cd.symbol_html_code, cd.active as code_detail_active, cd.level, cd.up_level_id, cd.remarks as code_detail_remarks, cd.create_date, cd.update_date, cd.created_by, cd.updated_by from code c inner join code_detail cd on c.id = cd.code_id

select com.id as component_id, com.component_code, com.component_name, com.component_type_code_id, cd.detail_code, cd.display_text_en as detail_code_display_text_en, cd.display_text_chi as detail_code_display_text_chi, com.seq as component_seq, com.is_menu_item, com.component_desc, com.url, com.component_level, com.up_component_id, comc.id as component_control_id, comc.user_id, comc.user_role_id, comc.component_id, comc.create, comc.read, comc.update, comc.delete, comc.deny, comc.visible, comc.enable, comc.control_desc from component com inner join component_control comc on com.id = comc.component_id inner join code_detail cd on com.component_type_code_id = cd.id where user_role_id = ?
